item.title: How-to monitor Docker ?
item.description: The use of containers needs a strong supervision with different metrics than traditional VMs. For monitor Docker hosts, I use a stack of InfluxDB a time-series database, Grafana the data visualiser and finally Telegraf to ship our metrics from few hosts. I’ll show you how-to deploy InfluxDB and Grafana on a docker host and install Telegraf on a Debian-based distribution. For sure, we can use Telegraf on Docker but personally, I prefer to install it directly on hosts to make it more permanent.
